name: Example Winery
tagline: Where every sip tells a story
description: A family-owned vineyard nestled in the rolling hills of Yadkin Valley, producing award-winning wines since 1995.
setting: Hilltop vineyard with panoramic mountain views
perfect_if: You love dry reds, You want stunning views, You appreciate small-batch wines
insider_tip: Ask for the library wine tasting - not on the menu but worth it
